page.title: 08Wildlife around Ryhope
page.content: { Ryhope}is quite a good place for looking at wildlife.{Wildlife}can be found everywhere in Ryhope but we felt that there were three places where it could be seen best. These were:-{the {seashore, Sunniside,}and{Cherry Knowle {Dene. The{cliffs}by the{seashore}are being eroded quite quickly by the{sea} and the weather as they are made of clay. There are a number of rockpools which are exciting to explore. In{Sunniside}there are lots of bushes. There are signs that it is inhabited by foxes, rabbits and badgers. { Cherry Knowle Dene}seems to be the best place to observe wildlife in Ryhope. A stream runs through the{ {dene,}either side of which there are different types of trees. It is also a good place to study{wild flowers.
